It lists staff positions, assignments, and shift times, and includes a note referencing 'Thomas, M OT (NC)' and 'Noel, T' with a timestamp. keyFacts: This document is a staff assignment roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York for Wednesday, July 24, 2019.
The roster details various prison staff positions, shift times (e.g., 00:00-08:00, 06:00-14:00), and assignments (e.g., SEC OPS, SHU, VISIT, ESCORT).
Two staff members are named: 'Thomas, M' and 'Noel, T', with the latter associated with a timestamp of '23/2019 11:43:09 PM'.
The document provides insight into the operational structure and staffing of the MCC during the time Jeffrey Epstein was held there prior to his death in August 2019.
The roster includes standard prison units and functions such as the Special Housing Unit (SHU), attorney conference units, visitation, and security details.
